metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2399 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Integer overflow in the quicktime_read_pascal function in libquicktime1.2.4 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service orpossibly have other unspecified impact via a crafted hdlr MP4 atom.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2399` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libquicktime2 - 2:1.2.4-7+deb8u1build0.16.04.1
quicktime-utils - 2:1.2.4-7+deb8u1build0.16.04.1
quicktime-x11utils - 2:1.2.4-7+deb8u1build0.16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libquicktime package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.2.4-7+deb8u1build0.16.04.1').
